activities.name: Easter Markets in Upper Square
activities.description: Traditional Easter markets featuring hand-painted eggs, willow branches, local crafts, and seasonal Czech treats like mazanec (Easter bread) and beránek (lamb-shaped cake).
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring brings the most important Czech holiday with colorful traditions and family celebrations.
activities.booking_tips: Visit early morning for the best selection of handcrafted items and traditional Easter decorations.

activities.name: Cherry Blossom Viewing at Bezručovy Sady
activities.description: Enjoy the beautiful cherry blossoms in full bloom at Bezručovy Sady park, offering scenic views of the city and peaceful walking paths.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring is perfect for enjoying the cherry blossoms, which typically bloom from late March to mid-April.
activities.booking_tips: Bring a picnic blanket and arrive early to enjoy the peaceful atmosphere before crowds arrive.

activities.name: Visit to the Archbishop's Palace
activities.description: Explore the magnificent Archbishop's Palace, the residence of the Archbishop of Olomouc, featuring beautiful Baroque architecture and historic interiors.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring rains can be unpredictable, making indoor historical sites an ideal activity.
activities.booking_tips: Check opening hours in advance and consider a guided tour for deeper historical insights.

activities.name: Spring Walks Along the Morava River
activities.description: Take leisurely walks along the Morava River promenade, enjoying the spring greenery and views of the historic city center.
activities.seasonal_notes: The riverbanks come alive in spring with blooming flowers and pleasant weather.
activities.booking_tips: Wear comfortable walking shoes and bring a camera to capture the scenic views.

activities.name: Student Cultural Festival
activities.description: Experience the vibrant student culture at Palacký University's spring festival, featuring music performances, art exhibitions, and academic events.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring brings renewed energy to the university district with various cultural activities.
activities.booking_tips: Check the university's event calendar for specific dates and performances.

activities.name: Traditional Czech Easter Celebrations
activities.description: Participate in traditional Czech Easter celebrations including the pomlázka (whipping) tradition, egg decorating workshops, and Easter Sunday services.
activities.seasonal_notes: Easter is the most important spring holiday in Czech culture with unique traditions.
activities.booking_tips: Respect local customs and consider attending a traditional Easter service at St. Wenceslas Cathedral.

activities.name: Spring Photography Tour
activities.description: Capture the beauty of Olomouc's Baroque architecture and spring blooms with a guided photography tour of the historic center.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring light is perfect for architectural photography with blooming trees and clear skies.
activities.booking_tips: Book with a local photographer for insider knowledge of the best angles and timing.

activities.name: Local Spring Markets
activities.description: Explore local spring markets offering fresh produce, seasonal flowers, and traditional Czech goods at various locations throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring markets are bustling with seasonal produce and vibrant flowers.
activities.booking_tips: Visit early for the best selection and fewer crowds.

activities.name: Olomouc Summer Festival
activities.description: Enjoy classical music performances in historic venues including St. Maurice Church and the Archbishop's Palace during the annual summer festival.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer brings the city's premier cultural event with world-class performances in historic settings.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets in advance as performances often sell out quickly.

activities.name: Outdoor Beer Gardens
activities.description: Experience traditional Czech beer culture in outdoor beer gardens throughout the city, especially popular in the university district.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer evenings are perfect for enjoying Czech beer in beautiful outdoor settings.
activities.booking_tips: Try local breweries like Svatováclavský Minipivovar for authentic Czech beer experience.

activities.name: Boat Tours on the Morava River
activities.description: Take scenic boat trips along the Morava River with views of the historic city center and surrounding countryside.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer offers pleasant weather for river cruises with lush greenery along the banks.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets in advance, especially on weekends, to ensure availability.

activities.name: Visit to the Holy Trinity Column
activities.description: Explore the UNESCO World Heritage Holy Trinity Column, the most outstanding example of Central European Baroque art, with guided tours available.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer provides the best lighting to appreciate the column's intricate sculptures and details.
activities.booking_tips: Visit early morning to avoid crowds and get the best photographs.

activities.name: University Campus Tours
activities.description: Explore the historic Palacký University campus, one of the oldest universities in Central Europe, with beautiful architecture and rich academic history.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer offers quieter campus atmosphere with fewer students and pleasant weather for walking tours.
activities.booking_tips: Contact the university in advance to arrange guided tours of historic buildings.

activities.name: Cycling Around Olomouc
activities.description: Rent a bike and explore Olomouc's historic center and surrounding areas, including the university district and river paths.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer climate is ideal for outdoor cycling with long daylight hours and scenic routes.
activities.booking_tips: Use local bike rental services and follow designated cycling paths for safety.

activities.name: Rooftop Dining at Hotel Arigone
activities.description: Dine at Hotel Arigone's rooftop restaurant offering traditional Czech cuisine with panoramic views of the historic city center.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer evenings are perfect for rooftop dining with comfortable temperatures and spectacular sunsets.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve a table in advance, especially for sunset dining with city views.

activities.name: Explore the Astronomical Clock
activities.description: Visit the unique Olomouc Astronomical Clock, featuring socialist-realist style design and moving figures that perform at noon daily.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer provides the best conditions to see the clock's moving figures and detailed artwork.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive 10 minutes before noon to secure a good viewing spot for the moving figures.

activities.name: Visit to St. Wenceslas Cathedral
activities.description: Explore the magnificent St. Wenceslas Cathedral with the tallest church spire in Moravia (100.65m) and beautiful Gothic architecture.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is a great time to explore indoor attractions as the weather cools down.
activities.booking_tips: Check service times and consider attending a mass for a unique cultural experience.

activities.name: Autumn Foliage Walks in Bezručovy Sady
activities.description: Take leisurely strolls through Bezručovy Sady park, enjoying the vibrant fall colors and peaceful atmosphere.
activities.seasonal_notes: The park is particularly beautiful in autumn with golden fall colors and crisp air.
activities.booking_tips: Visit in the afternoon for the best lighting for photography of the autumn foliage.

activities.name: Wine Tasting in Local Pubs
activities.description: Discover Moravian wines with tastings at traditional Czech pubs and wine bars throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is harvest season in Moravia, making it an ideal time for wine tasting.
activities.booking_tips: Try local Moravian wines and ask pub owners for recommendations of regional specialties.

activities.name: Visit to St. Maurice Church
activities.description: Tour the historic St. Maurice Church featuring Europe's largest church organ and beautiful Baroque architecture.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn's cooler days are perfect for indoor activities like church visits.
activities.booking_tips: Check organ concert schedules for a special musical experience.

activities.name: Olomouc Autumn Festival
activities.description: Attend the annual autumn festival featuring classical music performances, art exhibitions, and cultural events throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: This annual event celebrates culture and art, perfect for crisp autumn evenings.
activities.booking_tips: Check the festival program in advance and book tickets for popular performances.

activities.name: Visit to the Archbishop's Museum
activities.description: Explore the Archbishop's Museum showcasing religious art, historical artifacts, and the rich cultural heritage of Olomouc.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn's shorter days make museums an ideal choice for cultural enrichment.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online to avoid queues and consider a guided tour for deeper insights.

activities.name: Traditional Czech Cooking Class
activities.description: Learn to cook traditional Czech dishes with a hands-on cooking class, focusing on seasonal ingredients and regional specialties.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn's harvest provides a bounty of ingredients for culinary exploration.
activities.booking_tips: Book early, especially for popular classes, and check if the class includes a market visit.

activities.name: Explore the Baroque Fountains
activities.description: Visit Olomouc's famous Baroque fountains including Caesar's Fountain, Neptune Fountain, and Hercules Fountain.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn provides beautiful lighting for photographing the intricate Baroque sculptures.
activities.booking_tips: Take your time to appreciate the details of each fountain and their historical significance.

activities.name: Christmas Markets in Upper Square
activities.description: Experience magical Christmas markets featuring traditional Czech crafts, mulled wine (svařené víno), gingerbread, and festive decorations around the Holy Trinity Column.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter markets are a quintessential part of the holiday season, offering a warm, festive atmosphere.
activities.booking_tips: Visit in the evening for the best atmosphere and to see the festive lights illuminating the Holy Trinity Column.

activities.name: Ice Skating at Bezručovy Sady
activities.description: Enjoy ice skating on the outdoor rink set up in Bezručovy Sady park, a festive winter tradition in Olomouc.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is the perfect time for ice skating, with rinks set up around the city.
activities.booking_tips: Skate rentals are available on-site, but lines can be long, so arrive early.

activities.name: Attend a Concert at St. Maurice Church
activities.description: Experience classical music concerts in the stunning setting of St. Maurice Church, featuring its famous organ and beautiful acoustics.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter evenings are perfect for indoor concerts, providing warmth and cultural enrichment.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets in advance, as concerts often sell out quickly.

activities.name: Visit to the Archbishop's Palace
activities.description: Tour the opulent Archbishop's Palace and its historic interiors, less crowded during the winter months.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter offers fewer crowds, allowing a more leisurely exploration of the palace.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online to avoid queues and consider an audio guide for a self-paced tour.

activities.name: Traditional Czech Christmas Dinner
activities.description: Enjoy a traditional Czech Christmas dinner featuring carp, potato salad, and traditional Christmas cookies at local restaurants.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is the perfect season for enjoying traditional Czech Christmas cuisine.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve a table well in advance, especially for Christmas Eve dinner.

activities.name: Visit to St. Wenceslas Cathedral
activities.description: Explore the historic St. Wenceslas Cathedral, a masterpiece of Gothic architecture, and attend Christmas services.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter offers a serene atmosphere for visiting iconic landmarks with fewer tourists.
activities.booking_tips: Check service times and consider attending a Christmas mass for a unique experience.

activities.name: New Year's Eve Celebrations
activities.description: Celebrate New Year's Eve with fireworks, live music, and festive atmosphere in Upper Square and throughout the historic center.
activities.seasonal_notes: New Year's Eve is a highlight of the winter season with spectacular fireworks and celebrations.
activities.booking_tips: Find a good vantage point early in the evening to avoid the crowds and bring warm clothing.

activities.name: Hot Chocolate at Local Cafes
activities.description: Warm up with traditional Czech hot chocolate and pastries at cozy cafes throughout the historic center.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is the perfect season for enjoying indulgent hot beverages and warm pastries.
activities.booking_tips: Try local cafes like Eatery & Bakery for authentic Czech pastries and hot drinks.

activities.name: Winter Photography Tour
activities.description: Capture the beauty of Olomouc's Baroque architecture and winter atmosphere with a guided photography tour.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter provides unique lighting conditions for architectural photography with snow-covered rooftops.
activities.booking_tips: Book with a local photographer for insider knowledge of the best winter angles and timing.
